## Future Goals

I aim to pursue a career at the intersection of medical imaging and artificial intelligence, focusing on:

1. Developing novel cardiac imaging biomarkers
2. Translating research innovations into clinical practice
3. Advancing AI-driven medical image analysis
4. Contributing to precision medicine through imaging

My graduate education at CWRU and research experience at Cleveland Clinic are preparing me to make significant contributions to the field of biomedical imaging.
